title: Fearmonger

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Villainize.
- At night, choose to Blackmail any Villainized player instead. You can't do this two nights in a row.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Villainized role names are appended to have "... but EVIL!" at the end.
- Their role number has "-Evil" appended to the end.
- They are framed as a Peasant Chaos Fearmonger.
- If you Villainize an evil role, you will instead append "... but GOOD!" at the end of their role name.
- They are framed as a Peasant Chaos Fearmonger.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: See 3 Villainized players die via the good faction (whether hanging, shot, etc).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4451
*"- and then he cackled maniacally, talking about how our doom was imminent! So what, he's the Sheriff... but evil!"*
